page.title: 05 HOUSING
page.content: MINIMUM HOUSE PRICE 35,000 EXCEPT SMALL SINGLE PERSON/FIRST TIME BUYER ACCOMODATION LACKING GARDEN ETC. PROPERTY NEAR CENTRE IS VICTORIAN TERRACED,LACKING FRONT GARDEN/GARAGE, OFTEN DELAPIDATED/NEGLECTED.SOME OF THESE OCCUPIED BY SIKH COMMUNITY. SOME LARGE VICTORIAN PROPERTIES NOW DIVIDED INTO FLATS WITH NEWER PROPERTY IN GROUNDS.HOUSING PROGRESSIVELY NEWER AWAY FROM TOWN & GENERALLY BETTER CARED FOR.BIGGER GARDENS BUT FEW GARAGES TILL POST 1946.PARKING IN ROADS IS SERIOUS HAZARD.MOST ATTRACTIVE IS NEW BUILDING ON EDGE OF TOWN.THESE ARE SMALL HOUSES WITH SMALL GARDENS BUT INTEGRAL GARAGE. SOME NEW BUILDING ON SPORTSGROUNDS NEAR TOWN CENTRE & SOME PRESTIGE HOUSES ON PRIME SITES.SOME DEMOLISHED VICTORIAN HOUSING LEAVES SPACE FOR CAR PARKING& SHOPPING CENTRE.MARCH 85.1755 ON COUNCIL WAITING LIST.NO NEW C.BUILDING.
